name: Self-Sufficient Income Streams
description: Developing financial autonomy by creating independent revenue sources outside centralized control.

cards.title: Building a Passive Income Strategy
cards.description: Diversifying income through automated and recurring revenue sources.
bulletpoints: Real estate rental, digital content monetization, and online assets.
Creating cash flow without dependency on traditional employment.
Scaling financial independence through multiple revenue channels.
cards.summaryText: Stack rentals, digital assets, and automations to keep cash flowing beyond employer control.

cards.title: Decentralized Business Models
cards.description: Running businesses that are independent of banking and centralized platforms.
bulletpoints: Accepting crypto and precious metals for transactions.
Leveraging privacy-focused e-commerce and marketplace platforms.
Structuring income streams to evade financial choke points.
cards.summaryText: Run bankless ventures, take hard-money payments, and route sales through privacy markets to dodge choke points.

cards.title: Barter and Off-Grid Value Exchange
cards.description: Developing trade networks that function independently of fiat currency.
bulletpoints: The power of local trade circles and peer-to-peer barter systems.
Using labor, goods, and services as direct currency alternatives.
Creating a parallel economy resilient to economic warfare tactics.
cards.summaryText: Build barter circles, trade labor and goods directly, and reinforce a parallel, resilient economy.
